name: camera
description: component that allows users to access system camera.

propSpec.name: hasLabel
propSpec.desc: When true, the camera will have a label

propSpec.name: defaultToCamera
propSpec.desc: When true, the camera will be shown by default

propSpec.name: hideFunctions
propSpec.desc: When true, the camera functions will be shown

propSpec.name: handleOnImageTaken
propSpec.desc: A handler which is executed when the image is taken

propSpec.name: handleOnClear
propSpec.desc: A handler which is executed when the clear button is pressed

propSpec.name: handleOnVideoRefChanged
propSpec.desc: A handler which is executed the video source changes
